start:
⚡️ *Mediumgram* ⚡️

Read Medium articles on Telegram!

You can control me by sending these commands:


🔸 /user ***<username>*** - Get the last articles from a specific user

🔸 /publication ***<publication>*** - Get the last articles from a specific publication

🔸 /custom ***<domain.com>*** - Get the last articles from a specific publication with custom domain

🔸 /tag ***<tag>*** - Get the last articles with a specific tag

🔸 /tagged ***<publication>*** ***<tag>*** - Get the last articles from a specific publication with a specific tag

If you need the list of the commands just type /help
help:
You can control me by sending these commands:


🔸 /user ***<username>*** - Get the last articles from a specific user

🔸 /publication ***<publication>*** - Get the last articles from a specific publication

🔸 /custom ***<domain.com>*** - Get the last articles from a specific publication with custom domain

🔸 /tag ***<tag>*** - Get the last articles with a specific tag

🔸 /tagged ***<publication>*** ***<tag>*** - Get the last articles from a specific publication with a specific tag

If you need the list of the commands just type /help
user:
Please specify a username after the command to get the last articles from a specific user.


*Example:*

/user zaccariafra


If you need the list of the commands just type /help
publication:
Please specify a publication after the command to get the last articles from a specific publication.


*Example:*

/publication the-mission


If you need the list of the commands just type /help
custom:
Please specify a domain after the command to get the last articles from a specific publication with custom domain.


*Example:*

/custom \hackernoon.com


If you need the list of the commands just type /help
tag:
Please specify a tag after the command to get the last articles with a specific tag.


*Example:*

/tag news


If you need the list of the commands just type /help
tagged:
Please specify a publication and a tag after the command to get the last articles from a specific publication with a specific tag.


*Example:*

/tagged the-mission news


If you need the list of the commands just type /help
